name: worker-pool
description: ```javascript const worker = (task) => {   return new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => {     try {       let fetchResult = await fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/${task}`)       if (fetchResult.ok) {         let pageContents = await fetchResult.text()         resolve(pageContents)       }     } catch (err) {       reject(err)     }   }) }
